pitt.search.semanticvectors

Class LuceneUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • pitt.search.semanticvectors.LuceneUtils

  • public class LuceneUtils
extends Object
    Class to support reading extra information from Lucene indexes, including term frequency, doc frequency.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LuceneUtils.TermWeight
      Determines which term-weighting strategy to use in indexing, and in search if FlagConfig.usetermweightsinsearch() is set.

      • getGlobalTermFreq

        public int getGlobalTermFreq(org.apache.lucene.index.Term term)
        Gets the global term frequency of a term, i.e. how may times it occurs in the whole corpus
        Parameters:
        term - whose frequency you want
        Returns:
        Global term frequency of term, or 1 if unavailable.

      • getGlobalTermWeightFromString

        public float getGlobalTermWeightFromString(String termString)
        Gets a term weight for a string, adding frequency over occurrences in all contents fields.

      • getGlobalTermWeight

        public float getGlobalTermWeight(org.apache.lucene.index.Term term)
        Gets a global term weight for a term, depending on the setting for FlagConfig.termweight(). Used in indexing. Used in query weighting if FlagConfig.usetermweightsinsearch is true.
        Parameters:
        term - whose frequency you want
        Returns:
        Global term weight, or 1 if unavailable.

      • getLocalTermWeight

        public float getLocalTermWeight(int docfreq)
        Gets a local term weight for a term based on its document frequency, depending on the setting for FlagConfig.termweight(). Used in indexing.
        Parameters:
        docfreq - the frequency of the term concerned in the document of interest
        Returns:
        Local term weight

      • getNumDocs

        public int getNumDocs()
        Returns the number of documents in the Lucene index.

      • termFilter

        public boolean termFilter(org.apache.lucene.index.Term term)
        Public version of termFilter(org.apache.lucene.index.Term) that gets all its inputs from the flagConfig and the provided term. External callers should normally use this method, so that new filters are available through different codepaths provided they pass a FlagConfig.
        Parameters:
        term - Term to be filtered in or out, depending on Lucene index and flag configs.

      • termFilter

        protected boolean termFilter(org.apache.lucene.index.Term term,
                 String[] desiredFields,
                 int minFreq,
                 int maxFreq,
                 int maxNonAlphabet)
        Filters out non-alphabetic terms and those of low frequency. Thanks to Vidya Vasuki for refactoring and bug repair
        Parameters:
        term - Term to be filtered.
        desiredFields - Terms in only these fields are filtered in
        minFreq - minimum term frequency accepted
        maxFreq - maximum term frequency accepted
        maxNonAlphabet - reject terms with more than this number of non-alphabetic characters
